justification: "Participants performed three behavioural tasks... The tasks examined foraging behaviour (milkman task)"
"The tasks examined... basic processing speed (choice reaction time task)"
"The tasks examined... executive function or planning abilities (Tower of London task)."
"First, Apathy Evaluation Scale (AES) was used to examine individual differences in apathy symptoms."
"Second, depressive symptoms were assessed using the nine-item Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9)."
